name: DeadlandVR : Action Shooter FPS
description: Deadland VR is a story about when Zombie Apocalypse Happens, Everyone Runs and Hide. Except for us Gamers who've been waiting for this day all life. Are you the One...? If So, then better hold your position, gather up your Guns and Load-up, because these creatures Run, Fly and Shoot.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 (AMD FX 8350) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) DirectX: Version 8.2 Storage: 1100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i7-5th series (AMD FX 9th) or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 or better Storage: 1100 MB available space Sound Card: Any
